text:
[Verse]
Step into the night
Feel the rhythm right
Stars are shining bright
We're dancing till the light

[Verse 2]
Feet move to the beat
Heart skips a repeat
Here on this quiet street
Girls and boys meet

[Chorus]
Dancing under the moonlight
Everything feels so right
Holding each other tight
In the cool night

[Verse]
Laughter fills the air
No worries no care
Faces glowing there
With a love we share

[Bridge]
The music takes control
It captures every soul
Lose yourself in whole
On this endless roll

[Chorus]
Dancing under the moonlight
Everything feels so right
Holding each other tight
In the cool night
title: Dancing Under the Moonlight
